availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky, resident and soldier. Married to Catherine Elizabeth Dunn in Hardeman County, Tennessee, in May 1834. Father of William Dunn. Farmer in Hardeman County, Tennessee, in 1840. Farmer in Hardeman County in 1850. Mustered into 34th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as Private on September 10, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardeman County, p. 295.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardeman County, p. 607.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 320.
KYR-0001-004-0769.
